title: Update Carrier Insurance Certificate
description: A carrier's insurance certificate is about to expire. A compliance specialist must obtain and upload the new certificate.

tasks.description: Receive a system alert that a carrier's insurance expires in 30 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is notified of the pending expiration.

tasks.description: Send an automated request to the carrier for their updated insurance certificate.
tasks.expected_outcome: An email is sent to the carrier's compliance contact.

tasks.description: Receive the new certificate from the carrier and upload it to their profile in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uploads the new document.

tasks.description: Update the expiration date in the carrier's profile, which removes the compliance alert.
tasks.expected_outcome: The carrier's profile is updated, and they remain in good standing.
